title: Shanghai Day 7 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
I reach the day 50 of my trip, so I still have 70 days in my front full of new adventures and experiences, new friends and a lot of Drupal.

Yesterday, I didnâ€™t do anything in regards of sightseeing, instead of I participate in a hangout with the rest of Drupal Console team to try to define next step to try to have our first 1.0.0-alpha version after Drupal 8.1 gets released.

After have a brunch and departure towards the Indonesian to pick up my passport and my visa to travel to Indonesia. With my visa confirm now I need to define if I will visit Jakarta or Bali or maybe both.

Continuing with community activities, I visited the offices of Davyin Internet Solutions; I have the opportunities to share my experiences of having a Drupal Workshop in a growing Drupal community. Also, I could do a demo of Drupal Console for them.

Finally at night, I had a dinner with other members of Drupal Shanghai community.

Walking

Distance (steps)
Shanghai (today) 10.824
Previously 599.872
Total 610.696
